body.name: HAUSHECK Queen Size Upholstered Bed Frame with Storage Headboard, 12" Height Underbed Spaces & 4 Fast Charging Ports, LED Bed Frame w/Remote Control, Noise Free Metal Bedframe No Box Spring Needed
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 26. Order within 6 hrs 41 mins
features: 【Upholstered Bed Frame】Perfect for modern bedrooms, this upholstered platform bed is not only stylish but functional as well. Classical and comfortable neutral-toned linen fabric upholstery, which is skin-friendly, breathable, and wear-resistant, adds sophisticated style to any bedroom. Furthermore, the gray color is a dirty-proof color that minimizes your cleaning troubles.

【Smart RGB Led Bed Frame】This Led bed frame features with Led-lit headboard for ambient mood lighting and the combination of rustic-wood and metal accents for industrial appearance. More than 60,000 color to be choose from, brightness, flash mode, timing, etc., can use the equipped remote control or mobile APP to set free easily. Change the led color to meet your needs of different styles and make the atmosphere more vivid!

【Storage Headboard with Charging Station】Our bed is equipped with a convenient storage shelf that includes built-in 20w fast charging ports (including 3 USB ports and 1 Type-C port). This feature allows you to conveniently charge all your electronic devices at any time, keeping them ready for use. Additionally, the headboard storage provides a practical space to keep common small items, such as remotes, within easy reach, ensuring easy access and organization.

【Sturdy & Noise Free Design】Queen bed frame with headboard and storage made of sturdy metal structure, 17 heavy duty metal slats and 11 support legs provide optimal support for all types of mattresses without the use of box springs. we've added a special silent sponge bar to the center beam of this platform bed to eliminate friction between the metal components to ensure your sleep environment, Sleep or be active in this bed without being disturbed by noise.

【Easy Assembly & Packing】Everything you need for painless setup of this queen bed frame with LED lights is efficiently packed in ONE box and shipped directly to your door; and the assembly instructions are clear and easy to follow, 2 person assembly of this queen bed frame with headboard takes less than an hour.
body.description: -- Perfect for modern bedrooms, this upholstered platform bed is not only stylish but functional as well. This Led bed frame features with Led-lit headboard for ambient mood lighting and the combination of rustic-wood and metal accents for industrial appearance. -- Our bed is equipped with a convenient storage shelf that includes built-in 20w fast charging ports (including 3 USB ports and 1 Type-C port). This feature allows you to conveniently charge all your electronic devices at any time, keeping them ready for use. -- Bed frame with headboard and storage made of sturdy metal structure, 17 heavy duty metal slats and 11 support legs provide optimal support for all types of mattresses without the use of box springs. we've added a special silent sponge bar to the center beam of this platform bed to eliminate friction between the metal components to ensure your sleep environment, Sleep or be active in this bed without being disturbed by noise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 3 hours to put together, but very sturdy!
reviews.reviewText: Some parts of this it is definitely helpful to have two people. The screws on the USB put use a power drill if possible. The directions were pretty straight forward. It seems very solid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Honestly better than expected
reviews.reviewText: Everything was very neatly packed and labeled as the directions described. Came with all of the hardware but I think it's a big bonus that they include an extra piece of hardware for every piece you use just incase. Very straight forward to putting together. Would highly recommend using 2 people as warned in the directions but I was able to easily accomplish putting it together and standing it myself. The coloring of the wood is exactly what the images showed. I wasn't necessarily interested in the leds but once on they look amazing and I'm glad they are included. Super simple velcro on and plug in. Has an app where you can deeply customize the colors and functions. I'd definitely buy this item again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Clear your schedule...
reviews.reviewText: Bed itself is nice and is of good quality. Be prepared to spend an unreasonable amount of time tho putting this thing together. All arrived in one package. Once opened, I saw an almost endless amount of screws and small monotonous parts. Figured I could get this done in one evening; I was wrong. I have experience building things, and have many tools however this thing was a pain in the you know what. Instructions weren't very helpful, as I had to adjust things as I went along. Overall I am satisfied with my purchase, and I would recommend this product. Just prepare to spend a couple of hours on this thing while cussing and getting frustrated

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely luv this bed. My daughter loves it so much. So easy to put together and good quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pressed wood items need to be packaged and protected more.
reviews.reviewText: The drawers (both) had damage to them as it’s pressed wood and they do not mount onto bed they just roll on wheels on floor. It was fairly easy to assemble. I guess for the price it was ok. Looks cute assembled.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Easy Assembly
reviews.reviewText: Bed came faster than expected and was assembled in just about 2 hours with just one person. Very sturdy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was a bit difficult to put together, instructions are misleading a bit. Still a great product!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Strong frame, toe stubber
reviews.reviewText: This bed frame is all around great but I just cannot understand why the design of it is for the legs to stick out beyond the size of the mattress. If anything it should be that the legs are sheltered in inch or so inward of the edge of the mattress not outside of that circumference. I absolutely swear to you consumer, you better be prepared to stub your toe a couple dozen times.
